description:
Sama Mesa Box Canyon features a 50 foot elevator downclimb, a 35 foot R downclimb at the final rappel, numerous short downclimbs in the 15 to 20 foot range, and a stemming section over log debris in the lower section. A good option for advanced canyoneers who want to try to downclimb the whole route. A good option for beginner hike-and-rappel canyoneers who want to try downclimbing on short and secure drops. If you have done Alcatraz and Chambers and want to up your game this is a great option in the Roost.

Approach

Descent

Exit

THE LONG EXIT GOING ALL THE WAY TO THE DRYFALL IS NOT RECOMMENDED. This will add 4.5mi of hiking with very little payoff. For a scenic adventure a short drive down Sams Mesa Box road offers spectacular views over Happy Canyon similar to views from the rim of the Grand Canyon.
